presentation_text: Thank you, Lisa.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: This morning Maximus reported revenue for the first quarter of fiscal 2021, which increased 15.6% to $945.6 million.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Revenue for the first quarter was in line with our expectations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our revenue growth was principally driven by new work related to the COVID pandemic response, where Maximus continues to play an integral role in contact tracing, disease investigation, vaccination support, unemployment insurance programs, and other key initiatives.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: For the first quarter of fiscal 2021, our COVID response work contributed approximately $160 million in revenue.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As expected, top and bottom line growth were offset by ongoing impacts of the global pandemic tied to program changes on volume-based contracts that were implemented at the direction of our customers.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As we discussed last quarter, these changes, including halting Medicaid redeterminations in the United States, are designed to ensure that beneficiaries have uninterrupted access to vital government benefits during this global health crisis.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Total company operating margin was 9.3% for the first quarter of fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Divided earnings per share were $1.03 per share.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Both operating margin and earnings were in line with our expectations with some variability by segment.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our operations outside the United States delivered results favorable to our expectations, which offset lower operating income from the U.S.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We are pleased to have secured COVID response work to backfill some of the temporary shortfalls created by reduced volumes, revenue, and profit from accretive performance-based contracts.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The better than expected result for the quarter was primarily due to job placement activities in Australia, driven by a seasonal spike in demand for qualified job seekers.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As Australia started to emerge from the pandemic during our first quarter, employers needed to quickly fill many retail and travel-related jobs during the busy holiday and travel season.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The Australian team did an extraordinary job in successfully managing this influx of demand, but we view this seasonal spike as unique to the first quarter of fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We continue to see strong demand for employment services in all of our international operations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We have had positive developments since our last earnings call related to increasing demand and rising volumes for employment services.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We anticipate that volumes from current programs, most notably in Australia, and supplemented by new work, will drive revenue growth in the second half of fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: It is important to note that the new work consists of outcomes-based arrangements for employment services.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: They are designed to ensure that contractors can be held accountable and incentivized to achieve the job placement and retention outcomes that matter to government.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: This new employment services work drives our revenue estimates upward, but these programs are expected to generate losses in their early stages.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: However, we target operating margins within our desired corporate average over the life of such programs.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We presently estimate that these startups will put the outside the U.S.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: segment in a lost position in the second quarter, with steady improvement through the remainder of the year.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We now expect that the segment will be approximately break-even for fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Maximus enjoys a long history, strong reputation, and demonstrated success in delivering employment services.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We believe the investment required will position us for favorable economics over the life of the contracts, which outweighs the temporary adverse impact in profit for the remainder of fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We believe such programs are a good avenue to create substantial long-term shareholder value.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Let me turn to cash flow items and the balance sheet.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We had no draws on our corporate credit facility at December 31, 2020, and $132.6 million of cash and cash equivalents.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Cash from operations and free cash flow of $98.1 million and $89 million, respectively, were strong and contributed to our already strong balance sheet.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: DSO was 75 days at December 31, 2020, compared to 77 days at September 30, 2020.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Let me touch briefly on capital allocation.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While we generally operate under an essential provider designation, we remain aware of budget pressures impacting our customers.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: However, with our corporate credit facility and the aforementioned strong cash flows and balance sheet, liquidity is not a concern.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We continue to have a bias toward M&A as a means to drive long-term organic growth.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our M&A program continues to evaluate prospects while we remain prudent stewards of capital and selective in our evaluations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our strong balance sheet and good cash from operations provides us good access to capital to fund acquisitions.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We remain committed to future quarterly cash dividends, and share purchases will continue to be made opportunistically.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While it is still early in the year, recent award scope increases and contract extensions have provided us with cautious optimism as we consider our full-year guidance.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As a result of these positive developments, we are raising our full-year guidance for fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: For the full year, we expect revenue will now range between $3.4 billion and $3.525 billion for fiscal 2021, driven by new work in support of government's ongoing response to COVID.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Additionally, we expect diluted earnings per share will range between $3.55 and $3.75 for fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our fiscal 2021 cash from operations are projected to now be between $350 million and $400 million, and free cash flow between $310 million and $360 million.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our expectations for our effective income tax rate is between 25.75% and 26.5%, and for weighted average shares to be between $62.1 million and $62.2 million.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As we have long said, we often experience fluctuations in our quarterly financial results.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: which has only been exacerbated by the pandemic.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: However, the management team aims to provide as much transparency into our work as reasonably possible.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: So based on what we know today, we still expect a decrease in revenue and earnings for the second quarter of fiscal 2021 compared to the first quarter.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Current second quarter consensus estimates show revenue of $773 million and diluted earnings per share of 73 cents.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: At the present time, we expect to be above consensus revenue and earnings estimates for the second quarter.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Consequently, fourth quarter consensus revenue of $875 million and daily returns per share of $1.02 are above our current expectations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While the new COVID response work is providing a short-term positive tailwind, it has shorter periods of performance than our core contracts.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As we have cautioned previously, there is no assurance that the tailing off of the positive impacts of the COVID response work will coincide with the return of our core contracts to previous volume and performance levels.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our bottom line continues to be somewhat tempered by unfavorable headwinds related to the pandemic and the temporary changes on mature core programs, most notably in the United States and United Kingdom.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The result has been a reduction in accretive revenue, which continues to temper operating income margins and diluted earnings per share.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We anticipate that as we emerge from the pandemic, many of these programs will begin to return to historical volume levels.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Factors such as the end of the public health emergency declaration in the United States and when we resume face-to-face assessments in the United Kingdom are particularly important to the pattern of expected recovery.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The effects of budget challenges, further relief packages, and other changes in policies or legislation are some, but not necessarily all factors that can impact our assumptions for fiscal 2021 and beyond.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: I would like to end by saying that Bruce and I are proud of the team at Maximus for remaining on track to deliver solid performance this fiscal year.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Following the outbreak of COVID, there were many unknowns that we had to work through.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Unknowns remain.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We are not free from the impacts of the pandemic.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: but we have a solid footing which gave us the confidence to raise guidance.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: And with that, I will turn the call over to Bruce.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Thank you, Rick, and good morning, everyone.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Last month, Maximus announced the planned retirement of our friend and trusted colleague, Rick Nadeau.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While we still have a few more earnings calls before his departure, I wanted to say that it has been an absolute privilege to work alongside Rick for these many years.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: And I wanted to thank him for his endless commitment and invaluable contributions during his time at Maximus.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: David Mutrin, Senior Vice President of Finance, will assume the role of CFO effective December 1st, 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: I look forward to working with both Rick and David over the next nine months as we continue to execute our corporate strategy.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: With the election of President Biden, we're cautiously optimistic regarding the stated policy initiatives from the administration and the potential favorable tailwinds that may be created for companies like Maximus.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The administration has already taken actions to increase access to affordable insurance for Americans through the Affordable Care Act and Medicaid.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Over the course of the administration, we will likely see a meaningful increase in funding for social welfare programs and, of course, public health programs.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Improving access to affordable health care is a top priority of the Biden administration, and the President has advocated building upon the Affordable Care Act, among other measures, to broaden coverage options for Americans.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Additionally, as we navigate through the pandemic, we believe we will see further policy initiatives that strengthen the public health infrastructure and a corresponding effort to more broadly support vulnerable populations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: President Biden has already expressed intent to tackle these challenges, and indeed many of his early executive orders look to expand the public health workforce to provide vital services to individuals.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our results this morning illustrate that Maximus is well positioned to help government add capacity and address critical public health needs now and into the future.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While it's still early days in the Biden administration, we're cautiously optimistic that the areas we have seen emphasized thus far will be reflected in subsequent budget and legislative priorities that set the stage for capitalizing on opportunities to partner with government in helping to achieve their policy initiatives.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our COVID response work is a prime example of the demonstrated value of our services and the relationships we've developed with our clients.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: In a time of unprecedented challenges, we are grateful to have earned the opportunity to provide needed assistance.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: These contracts have served as a revenue driver, offsetting some of the unfavorable impacts on operations that are experiencing a pandemic-related temporary slowdown or pause.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Initially, our COVID work centered around more immediate pandemic-driven needs such as contact tracing, disease investigation, and unemployment insurance programs.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our work has expanded as government demand has increased into new areas.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We launched efforts to support states in responding to public questions about vaccination registration, scheduling, and administration quickly, efficiently, and equitably.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We have hired several thousand employees to support these state and local efforts.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: At the federal level, as you know, we also operate the CDC helpline known as CDC Info, We recently added another 150 individuals as we scale up our operations yet again to answer questions regarding vaccinations.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Supporting several states and the CDC, we are the most experienced government partner in the market to provide vaccine administration citizen services.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Additionally, our U.S.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: federal services segment scaled up to 3,200 agents from 1,500 to support the IRS with the next round of the economic incentive payments.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Further, in order to improve the user experience and drive efficiency, we implemented our interactive virtual agent system in response to the increased demand.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As Rick noted, we're also experiencing increased demand for our employment support services around the globe.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The economic impacts of the global pandemic have left many unemployed and in need of vital support and finding work.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: It's important to remember that the pace at which different countries are emerging from the pandemic varies widely.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Some countries have progressed further in managing the spread of the pandemic and are now turning their attention to tackling the many residual challenges, including the economy and unemployment.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Maximus has a proven track record in delivering employment services and an earned reputation as a trusted long term partner who delivers outcomes that matter.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our continued investments support our position as a partner of choice over the long term, outweighing any temporary and short-term profit impacts in fiscal year 2021.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While the COVID work itself is comparatively short-term in nature, crisis support itself has a longer trajectory.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: While this pandemic was certainly unprecedented, this is not our first nor our last call to action in a time of public health or economic crisis.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We will continue to be there to support our clients and citizens in times of need with critical services and solutions.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our work is portable, adaptable from agency to agency and department to department, whether it's the IRS, CDC, FEMA, state health departments, or others around the world.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We adapt from crisis to crisis, whether a global health pandemic, a natural disaster, or economic challenges.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Along with the launch of Maximus Public Health, we view our capabilities in contingency planning for our government customers and the rapid implementation of citizen assistance services as a core competency and elemental to the long-term relationships that underpin our business.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Looking outside of the pandemic, I've previously talked about our solutions that are authorized under the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program, or FEDRAMP.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our FedRAMP certifications meet the most stringent security requirements of federal agencies as we aim to deliver innovative and cost-effective cloud-based solutions that support mission objectives and provide the highest quality citizen services, thereby transforming the user experience.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We fielded a survey of government technology leaders across federal, state, and local agencies to gain insights about where agencies are in their cloud adoption journey.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: and how they perceive the use of FedRAMP-authorized cloud solutions to support their modernization and transformation initiatives.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The vast majority of respondents recognized benefits from moving to a FedRAMP-authorized solution beyond adhering to mandates.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: This survey further affirmed our solid positioning to provide a range of FedRAMP-secure cloud solutions, as well as our clients' demand for this service.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: I will now turn to new awards and pipeline as of December 31st.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: For the first quarter of fiscal 2021, signed awards were $594 million of total contract value at December 31.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Further, at December 31, there were another $1.14 billion worth of contracts that had been awarded but not yet signed.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Let's turn our attention to our pipeline of addressable sales opportunities.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our total contract value pipeline at December 31st was $31.6 billion compared to $33.0 billion reported in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2020.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Of our total pipeline of sales opportunities, 71.1% represents new work.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: I want to reiterate the continued difficulty in predicting the impact that the global health pandemic may have on our pipeline, timing of new work, and return to previous operational levels.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: However, our strong reputation flexibility and agility has cemented our position as a go-to partner for government we have navigated administration transitions for decades and we firmly believe that the foundation is laid for continued opportunities to assist governments through these extraordinary times i wanted to wrap up my comments today reflecting on the events and protests that occurred in january at the u.s capital in washington d.c and in other areas of the country Like many of you, I was shocked and saddened by these events.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Maximus engages in the bipartisan political process in order to better understand our government clients' long-term goals.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Our board's Nominating and Governance Committee has oversight of the company's policies pertaining to political contributions and compliance.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We remain committed to the fundamental principle of our engagement in the political process, which is and will continue to be to never support or fund candidates or elected officials who encourage or support violence against the government of the United States.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: And one final note before we open it up for questions.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: The macro trends for our business remain unchanged.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: As the pandemic has underscored, governments around the world need better solutions to deliver on policy priorities that can change rapidly.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Social welfare programs that reflect long-term societal commitments and priorities increasingly face rising demand, shifting demographics, and unsustainable program costs.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: Maximus is well positioned to address these challenges and be a transformative partner.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We offer scalable, cost-effective, and operationally efficient services for a wide range of government programs.

speaker_title_P: Chief Financial Officer / President and Chief Executive Officer
presentation_text: We continue to believe our portfolio mix of core business, near adjacencies, and new growth platforms will allow us to achieve a healthy growth trajectory for years to come.

presentation_text: Thank you, Rick, and good morning, everyone.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Since I transitioned into the CEO role in 2018, I've spoken about our three-pronged strategy to accelerate our progress and drive the next phase of our growth through, first, digital transformation within the government services market, enabling new solution offerings to address the mission requirements of our customers and improve overall service delivery across our operations.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This began with improved tools for citizen engagement and process automation and is evolving to include new capabilities in artificial intelligence and machine learning, natural language processing, and advanced analytics to enhance our competitive position.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Second, clinical evolution to address long-term macro trends driving demand for independent and conflict-free business process management, or BPM, services.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: with a more clinical dimension, while maintaining the foundational elements of our business, operating customer engagement centers, and providing case management services.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: And third, market expansion, as we evaluate adjacent and emerging markets, organically grow the portfolio, and acquire capabilities and contracts to establish a foothold in these markets.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: We also consider our customers' longer-term visions for reengineering social program delivery models and, of course, macro trends.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: We aim for expansion that's a natural complement to our core services globally.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Today, I will focus on how recent efforts are aligning with these three strategic priorities, including the two acquisitions, recent wins, and COVID-19 implications.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As you know, in March, we announced the acquisition of the federal business of Attain.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: furthering two of our primary strategic pillars by, first, accelerating our digital transformation by strengthening our technology capabilities in application development and modernization, enterprise business solutions, cybersecurity, and the data sciences, including advanced analytics and machine learning.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: These capabilities address federal IT spending imperatives and priorities, while also being applicable to our BPM solutions.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: And secondly, expanding further in the U.S.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: federal market into new departments and agencies such as the Securities and Exchange Commission and Department of Homeland Security, as well as within our common clients such as the Department of Health and Human Services.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: While our integration is still in its early days, already I'm pleased to see how our teams are working together to address pipeline opportunities with our strongest capabilities and to share experience and skills to improve the solutions we're delivering to our federal customers.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As I spoke of briefly when we first announced the transaction, Attain brings innovation and experience in many competencies that are in greatest demand in federal, while Maximus brought scale and highly desirable contract vehicles like Alliant 2.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Together, we can now address opportunities where neither company would have previously been competitive.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Further executing on our strategy, We most recently announced an agreement to acquire privately held Veterans Evaluation Services, or VES, a premier provider of medical disability examinations, or MDEs, to the U.S.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Department of Veterans Affairs, the VA.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This significantly advances our strategic aim of clinical evolution while meaningfully expanding our presence in the VA.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As Rick stated, we expect to close this transaction in the third quarter.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: While our independent clinical assessments business has been growing at the U.S.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: state level through our 2016 acquisition of Ascend and subsequent organic growth primarily in Medicaid-related long-term care assessments, VES's expertise will create an opportunity for such growth at the federal level.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As a result, the independent health and disability assessments and appeals portion of our business will comprise a larger share of our overall portfolio and pipeline.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: lending further credibility to our organic growth efforts with other federal departments and in non-federal markets.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: The acquisition comes at an important time for the VA, as the Veterans Benefits Administration, or VBA, has been focused on reducing the inventory of exams that naturally has grown during the pandemic while preparing for the future needs of veterans with qualifying conditions.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: To that end, and as they've done periodically in the past, The VBA recently launched a market assessment to better understand industry capacity and capabilities.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Through our combination, we believe Maximus and VES bring the credibility and quality of an established partner and ability to rapidly add clinical capacity and invest in technology innovation that will benefit veterans and the VBA.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our goal is to both contribute to the timely reduction of pandemic-related inventory and be the partner of choice as the MDE program continues to develop.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our acquisitions of Attain and VES, as well as Essentia in 2015 and Citizen Engagement Center operations from GDIT in 2018, help us play a more meaningful role in the U.S.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: federal market as we build scale, expand, and diversify our customer base and improve our competitive advantage.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Concurrent with these acquisition efforts, we continue to win COVID-19 related work at the state and federal level, as Rick discussed in his remarks.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This includes the recently posted CDC vaccination hotline award, illustrating the trust that government places in Maximus based on our historical performance.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: While COVID-19 work is generally planned to be shorter term in nature, we remain well positioned to adjust as the pandemic related needs of our customers continue to evolve.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: These efforts also allow us to meet new customers, expand into new areas of service with existing customers, and increase our impact on their behalf.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Through this work, we build longer-term references and past performance credentials that are advantageous in future bidding.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: For instance, in areas like unemployment insurance, the demonstrated value of our model is creating opportunity for longer-term relationships with state departments of labor as they see the benefits of the flexibility and accountability we can provide in delivering outcomes that matter in more routine program areas.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Further, our ability to stand up solutions quickly during challenging times using effectively our modular capabilities makes event-driven work a beneficial element of our business model in response to less predictable but regularly recurring government needs.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our investment in the digital transformation of citizen services coupled with our decades-long experience, have been recognized by our government customers during this pandemic as we responded to real-time requests to quickly deliver support and services.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our outside-the-US teams are securing some exciting new wins as well.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As Rick mentioned, in the United Kingdom, We were recently awarded two prime contracts in our preferred regions to deliver the restart program, which provides 12 months of tailored and community-based support for people that have been unemployed long-term and directly impacted by the pandemic.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This contract was procured through the CARES framework, which I mentioned in my remarks in the fourth quarter of the last fiscal year, and is used for contracting national employment support programs.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Adding emphasis to Rick's earlier point, startup costs are typical with significant new contracts like this one.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Therefore, we anticipate Q3 and then Q4 earnings will step down sequentially as a result, followed by a subsequent rebound driving earnings estimates upward in fiscal year 2022.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: These programs create long-term shareholder value and will operate within our expected corporate range of profitability.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This is not the first time we've accepted startup losses for a longer-term and more significant future benefit.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: In total, the two contracts, the maximum that could be won by a single provider, are valued at more than $960 million, 690 million British pounds sterling, over the base and option periods totaling six years.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Maximus UK will be recruiting more than 1,500 people to deliver the programs.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: We have a long history of supporting workforce services in the UK, establishing our foothold in the UK employment and training marketplace in 2008 during the economic recession.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This solid platform, history of excellent performance, and strong client relationships have provided the necessary credentials to expand employment-focused programs as illustrated by this award.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: While this new work has provided some positive offset, our core operations in the UK continue to face disruption as a result of the pandemic.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This negative impact continues to be driven by temporary volume and revenue declines, as well as a pause on face to face assessments.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Although we continue to face decreased volume across some of our geographies in Australia, we are seeing strong volumes as the economy reopens.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Demand is holding more than we anticipated during the holiday season and serves as an example of anticipated volume return as certain countries slowly begin to emerge from the pandemic.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: All in all, we will remain dedicated to addressing COVID-19 implications with our customers while driving organic growth opportunities across the business.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: In that spirit, I will now turn to new awards and pipeline as of March 31st.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: As of the second quarter of fiscal 2021, Signed awards were $1.11 billion of total contract value at March 31st.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Further, at March 31st, there were another $1.28 billion worth of contracts that have been awarded but not yet signed.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: I should note that the CDC vaccination hotline and UK restart contract awards were subsequent to our March 31st cutoff.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Let's turn our attention to our pipeline of addressable sales opportunities.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our total contract value pipeline at March 31st was $35.6 billion compared to $31.6 billion reported in the first quarter of fiscal 2021.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Of our total pipeline of sales opportunities, 67.4% represents new work.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: On a final note, I'm excited to welcome our newest team members from Attain, and I'm looking forward to doing the same for our prospective colleagues from VES when the transaction closes.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: The hardest thing to get right in any integration is culture, and we've been very focused as an integrated leadership team on getting that right for all employees.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: Our goal for our colleagues from both Attain and VES is that you will have more opportunities to take on new challenges to advance your careers and to be rewarded for quality work.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: I want to congratulate and thank the Maximus team around the globe for their ongoing efforts during the pandemic to keep our employees safe, providing high-quality and innovative solutions to our customers, and best-in-class service to the individuals and families we serve.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: We've been fortunate to have been well-positioned to respond to the needs of government at a very challenging time.

speaker_title_P: President and Chief Executive Officer, Maximus
presentation_text: This has been possible only through the efforts of more than 35,000 colleagues worldwide and tens of thousands of delivery partner staff.
